column22: Terabitz is a personalized page service for real estate applications. It was founded in July 2006 by father and son co-founders Ashfaq Munshi and Kamran Munshi and is headquartered in Palo Alto, CA. Terabitz recently raised $10 million in Series A funding from Tudor Investments in February 2007.

column1: Terabitz allows users to gather all their important real estate tools, apps and data to one page that they can further personalize. Users are able to drag and drop their apps for Craigslist listings, Trulia listings, Google Maps, schools, restaurants, etc. Once they’
column2: ve created a page for a real estate market they&#8217
column3: re interested in they can then share it with others.
